hero.title: CosmoAdiuvo 🚀
hero.subtitle: Explore the universe with 3D Space Simulation + AI Astrology Assistant!

retrogradelist.title: Retrograde Calendar
retrogradelist.noRetrogrades: No retrograde events match your filters.

effectsTexts.communication_issues: Communication and travel delays, misunderstandings. Review action and reflection. Rethink communication, self-advocacy, and processing emotions.
effectsTexts.leo_travel_issues: Miscommunications, travel plan issues. Double-check details. Review self-expression and boldness.
effectsTexts.sag_partnerships: Reassess beliefs and partnerships involving finances or intimacy. Uncover hidden truths, transform outdated perspectives.
effectsTexts.venus_reevaluate_love: Re-evaluate life path, relationships, and boundaries. Reflect on desires, beauty, worthiness, love, and creativity. Release past hurts.
effectsTexts.venus_power_dynamics: Revisit power dynamics, intimacy, balance, and harmony in relationships.
effectsTexts.venus_comm_connection: Re-evaluate communication and intellectual connection in relationships.
effectsTexts.venus_commitment_career: Reconsider commitment and values related to career and stability in relationships.
effectsTexts.mars_goals_motivation: Reassess personal goals, motivation, and self-expression. Process anger and desires, focus on strategy and family matters.
effectsTexts.mars_health_creativity: Re-evaluate energy towards work and health. Revisit creativity and self-expression.
effectsTexts.mars_assertiveness: Reconsider assertiveness and balance in relationships. Re-evaluate impact on work, health, and routines.
effectsTexts.jupiter_comm_learning: Review communication, learning, travel plans, and intellectual pursuits.
effectsTexts.jupiter_home_family: Re-evaluate luck and expansion in home, family, and emotional security.
effectsTexts.jupiter_creativity: Re-evaluate luck and expansion in creativity, self-expression, and romance.
effectsTexts.jupiter_health_service: Re-evaluate luck and expansion in work, health, and service.
effectsTexts.jupiter_relationships: Re-evaluate luck and expansion in relationships, balance, and harmony.
effectsTexts.saturn_dreams: Re-evaluate responsibilities and limitations in dreams, spirituality, and the subconscious.
effectsTexts.saturn_communication: Reconsider responsibilities in communication, intellect, stability, security, and values.
effectsTexts.saturn_assertiveness: Re-evaluate responsibilities and limitations in self and assertiveness.
effectsTexts.saturn_stability: Reconsider responsibilities and limitations in stability, security, and values.
effectsTexts.saturn_comm_intellect: Re-evaluate responsibilities and limitations in communication and intellect.
effectsTexts.saturn_family: Reconsider responsibilities and limitations in home, family, and emotional security.
effectsTexts.uranus_finance_self: Re-evaluate security, finances, self-worth, individuality, and connection to the planet.
effectsTexts.neptune_dreams: Intensified intuition, review dreams and desires. Illusions may fade, revealing reality. Healing old wounds.
effectsTexts.neptune_assertive_dreams: More assertive and individual approach to dreams and spiritual pursuits. Blurring of lines between idealism and personal efforts.
effectsTexts.neptune_identity_focus: Effects on dreams and spiritual pursuits with a focus on individual identity.
effectsTexts.pluto_power_dilemma: Inner dilemmas between old systems and new visions. Re-evaluate personal power and role in the collective.
effectsTexts.pluto_power_collective: Re-evaluate personal power, role in the collective, and challenging old systems.
